title: A couple nice OJ's FS; Boyle & Brown
author: 3-2-count

posts.post_title: A couple nice OJ's FS; Boyle & Brown
posts.post_content:
Off to Ebay.........

I recently received these in trade from another board member, but they aren't in my collecting wheel house. They are from lot #69 in REA's latest auction.   Both cards display nice images & will grade numerically with no problem. PayPal via gift or money owed preferred. Please email if interested. Thanks all, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Boyle - staining on reverse
Brown - light glue residue on reverse

[IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/ojboylebrownfronts.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/ojboylebrownbacks.jpg[/IMG]
